overview: After a run in with a strip club owner and his goons, newlyweds Andrew and Cynthia are attacked on their honeymoon. The thugs kill him and think they've killed her, but she survives, goes crazy, starts believing a mannequin is her dead hubby and then must resort to bloody violence to protect herself when a hit is put out on her.
tagline: Two young newlyweds. A psychotic bent on revenge. A deadly honeymoon.
title: Kiss and Be Killed
